    Class Description
    ActionAuthenticator
    Used with HttpServer as a base class for authentication with action-controller
    ActionControllerConfigurationCompositeException
    Collects all exceptions during configuration to give a total view of all configuration exceptions that may have occurred.
    ActionControllerConfigurationException
    Thrown when something goes wrong during setup of a controller or the corresponding mapping.
    AnnotationFactory  
    ApiActionParameterUnknownMappingException
    Thrown when action-controller couldn't find out how to map a method parameter for an action method.
    ApiActionResponseUnknownMappingException
    Thrown when action-controller couldn't find out how to map the return value for an action method.
    ApiClient  
    ApiClientClassProxy
    Used to dynamically create a client implementation of a REST-ful interface defined through an Action Controller annotated interface or class (requires ByteBuddy).
    ApiClientExchange
    Abstracts a HTTP request and response from the client perspective.
    ApiClientProxy
    Used to dynamically create a client implementation of a REST-ful interface defined through an Action Controller annotated interface.
    ApiControllerAction
    The core of the framework.
    ApiControllerActionFactory<ANNOTATION extends Annotation>
    Implementations of this interface should be annotated on annotations used to convert methods to HTTP actions, such as GET and POST
    ApiControllerActionMXBean  
    ApiControllerActionMXBeanAdaptor  
    ApiControllerActionRouter
    A collection of ApiControllerActions which allows for routing
    ApiControllerCompositeException
    Collects all exceptions during configuration of a specific controller
    ApiControllerContext
    Extra initialization variables for the ActionControllers.
    ApiControllerMethodAction
    Represents a single action that can be performed on a controller.

    ApiHandler  
    ApiHttpExchange
    Abstracts the interaction with the http request and response.
    ApiServlet
    Subclass ApiServlet and implement init by calling registerController with all your controller classes.

    ConfigDirectoryLoader
    Given a ConfigDirectoryLoader.configDirectory, applicationName and profiles, monitors the files <applicationName>.properties and <applicationName>-<profile>.properties for each profile in the ConfigDirectoryLoader.configDirectory.

    HttpActionException
    Indicates that an error happened during the invocation of an action and that the user agent should receive the HTTP HttpActionException.statusCode.
    HttpClientException
    Thrown by ApiClientProxy when the HTTP request returned a failure status code.
    HttpClientParameterMapper
    Returned by HttpParameterMapperFactory to be used with ApiClientClassProxy to convert method arguments into HTTP request information.
    HttpClientReturnMapper
    Returned by HttpReturnMapperFactory to be used with ApiClientClassProxy to convert HTTP response information into method return values.
    HttpForbiddenException  
    HttpHeader
    When used on a parameter, maps the HTTP Request header to the parameter, converting the type if necessary.
    HttpHeader.Mapper  
    HttpNotFoundException  
    HttpParameterMapper
    Returned by HttpParameterMapperFactory to be used with ApiHttpExchange to convert HTTP request information into method invocation arguments.
    HttpParameterMapperFactory<ANNOTATION extends Annotation>
    Implementations of this interface should be annotated on annotations used to convert HTTP requests into method invocation arguments, such as RequestParam, PathParam and UnencryptedCookie
    HttpParameterMapping
    Attach parameter mapping behavior to an annotation.
    HttpRedirectException  
    HttpRequestException
    Indicate that an action could not be executed due to missing or incorrect HTTP request values.
    HttpResponseHeader
    Maps the return value to the specified HTTP Response header
    HttpResponseHeader.MappingFactory  
    HttpReturnMapper
    Returned by HttpReturnMapperFactory to be used with ApiHttpExchange to method invocation return values to HTTP response information.
    HttpReturnMapperFactory<ANNOTATION extends Annotation>
    Implementations of this interface should be annotated on annotations used to convert method invocation return values to HTTP response information, such as ContentBody and SendRedirect
    HttpReturnMapping
    Attach return value mapping behavior to an annotation.
    HttpRouterMapping
    Attach action generation behavior to an annotation.
